Title: BANDED SHOULDER EXTERNAL ROTATION
Directions: This is a strengthening exercise for the shoulder external rotators. Start by anchoring a band to a stable object beside you at roughly the level of mid torso. Grab the band with the furthest arm and raise the elbows to just below 90 degrees shoulder flexion. Externally rotate the arm by 90 degrees and hold the end range position for up to 2 seconds.
